projects.name: Global Fashion Group (GFG)
projects.details: is a webpage dedicated to the Global Fashion Group which operates many renown brands in fashion.

projects.name: CP Book Companion Website
projects.details: (short for Competitive Programming Book) is a book on advanced algorithms written by Dr. Steven Halim. This is therefore a webpage created for him and his publications. Not only it is a page to market the book, but also it automates bug reports and reviews from users.

projects.name: Catalyst
projects.details: , was built for the academic module CS2103, is a simple to-do list. However, unlike other to-do lists found online, it is a Java software with a persistent storage and features beyond the typical CRUD functions. It is also both keyboard-oriented and user-friendly. Information on its features can be found in its repository.
